DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety SI000413 patient knee osteoarthritis orally administration determine optimal dose .
DOC.detailed_description: This dose-response , double blind , placebo-controlled study . All patient require 2 week washout period prior medication . Subjects discontinue current medication 2 week prior randomization . Among meet inclusion criterion , subject record visual analogue scale ( VAS ) high 40mm ( VAS range 0mm ( pain ) 100mm ( unbearable pain ) ) enrol study . Subjects meet screen criterion randomize receive 8 week dose active dose SI000413 placebo .
